Name: charger production, for electric scooter | charger, for electric scooter | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/27:Manufacture of electrical equipment/279:Manufacture of other electrical equipment/2790:Manufacture of other electrical equipment
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/2921/documentation

This dataset describes the production of a charger suitable for an electric scooter. The entries are given as a function of kg of device. The original data was collected for a device of approximately 3 kg weight. The dataset is based on direct inspection of existing commercial devices of current technology.

The dataset takes as input the various electronic components required to build the charger and includes the components' production efforts. Assembly energy not included due to lack of data.

The dataset returns the assembled device and production waste as a by-product.
